descriptionHtml:
Far to the north of Dawnstar, an old hemit collects creatures for your benefit. Some have been Enchanted, some not. They fly over your shoulder and stay with you, they are animated.They use slot 44.  Check the vid..thanks to Captain Shack
http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=hwLWHBvTF4Q

After the collapse of the Keepers Tower, the old man has moved to a cave under the island. 

This is kind of a re-upload of an earlier mod. You do not need this if you already have the original Keepers Tower or Creature on my Shoulder.If you want to use this you MUST REMOVE the old versions. I have gotten requests to repost so I re-made the mod to this version.

 Added a NEW ESP for those having no-show, just overwrite the esp file.

 Fixed drunk moth and added a glowmoth by request from Lunae. Just merge and overwrite.

Comments welcome !



Please DO NOT upload to other sites or use assets without permission. Thanks BG
author: badgremlin

files.name: no drunk moth and add glowmoth
files.fileName: no drunk moth and add glowmoth-30622-3-2.7z
